snippet.title: Workplace Of Madness - Teaser Trailer (UNREAL ENGINE 5 SURVIVAL HORROR GAME)
snippet.description:
Wishlist my game now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1994750/In_The_Workplace_Of_Madness/

A monstrous entity looms over the employees of an insurance company. Theo, A normal office worker, finds himself engulfed in a deadly nightmare with no way out as secrets about the workplace are uncovered.

In The Workplace Of Madness tells a dreadful story through a unique visual style and survival horror.

Set one week after the accidental death of the owner of PrysmaCare Insurance, the storyline follows office salary man Theo and receptionist Stephanie as they struggle to survive after tragedy strikes their workplace.

Explore the offices of a company where a hideous being wanders and uncover secrets about your co-workers and yourself as you solve countless riddles that get in your way.

-Survival horror with a unique 2.5D art style inspired by recent HD 2D RPGs.
-Inspired by classic survival horror.
-Make decisions that impact the ending and the fate of the characters.
-Sneak past your stalker or run and hide. It's up to you.
-Solve puzzles as you make your way through the abandoned offices and other areas.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/workplaceofmadness/

Credits:
Created by: E.M. Astrum (https://www.instagram.com/e.m.astrum/)
Soundtrack by: Gavin Glover (https://www.instagram.com/gavin_glover_composer/)
Voice Acting by: George Gibb (https://www.voiceofgeorge.com/voice-acting)
End screen art by: weonji (https://twitter.com/1119wnj)

______________________
